stimulusHtml: Based on the provided data, which of the following best explains the change in energy resource use?

features.html:
The following data table shows the percentage of United States energy consumption by energy source for 2010 and 2017.

Energy Resource 2010 (%) 2017 (%)
Petroleum 37 37
Coal 21 14
Nuclear energy 9 9
Natural gas 25 29
Renewable resources 8 11

choicesHtml: Renewable sources replaced nonrenewable sources for electricity generation but not for transportation.
Most of the petroleum used in the United States is imported from other oil-rich countries.
United States power plants changed to nuclear energy for electricity generation rather than using renewable sources during this time period.
Petroleum power plants replaced natural gas power plants at the same time that new renewable energy plants were constructed.
